--- select_singer_with_in_and_unnest_with_query_parameter.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerId IN UNNEST(@singerIDs)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.TableName{
            Table: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where: &parser.Where{
      pos:  26,
      Expr: &parser.InExpr{
        Not:  false,
        Left: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  34,
          end:  42,
          Name: "SingerId",
        },
        Right: &parser.UnnestInCondition{
          pos:  46,
          end:  64,
          Expr: &parser.Param{
            pos:  53,
            Name: "singerIDs",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerId IN UNNEST(@singerIDs)
